answers.answer: Idk I meam thays really late to find out. The glucose test should be done between 24 and 28 weeks. So all you can really do at this point is watch your sugar intake.
Do you think they might induce me ? If shes getting big
I think they usually induce at 39 weeks if you have gestational diabetes.
All you can really do is change your diet. Since it's so late in your pregnancy I don't know if it'd help much. But if the baby is too big they probably will induce you.
I was diagnosed at 24 weeks with my first and I was induced two weeks early.
Ok thank you guys im just scared she may be big
My daughter was ten pounds but I was also insulin dependent in pregnancy! If you made it this far chances are the baby wont get too big.

You'll be fine. You'll just need to watch your carb intake and sugars. So watch all the bread, pasta, rice all that and by the way milk is a carb. I have gd. My sugars are fine. You shouldn't worry too much. Not everyone with gd has big babies.

question: Just got my 3 hour glucose test im pretty sure i have it i had it with my first !!! First question what are the chances i do have it ? And secondly what do you think the drs going to do with me being so far im already 37 weeks ?? Someone answer i havent watched the way i eat or none of that im scared my baby might be big ???? Thanks in advance
title: Diagnosed with Gestational diabetes at 37 weeks !!!
